textBox.richText: A long time since last update. Jan has been traveling to IBM and writing papers with students from Switzerland and Lafayette. FACES a collection of facial expressions with Olga, Nadia, Anton, Natasha and Dad. These were taken in September at home and at the Coffee Royale where we go every Saturday for breakfast. HALLOWEEN Cumberland School, where Nadia goes to first grade, had a Halloween celebration. Anton was dressed as Bobba Fett and got a balloon for a sword. A Russian party with costumes while Jan was at IBM. Natascha helps Nadia with her homework while both parents are at work. Nadia and Anton play together....
The season of falling leaves and candies...
